metadata.title: CVE-2023-22911 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.9, 1.36.x through 1.38.xbefore 1.38.5, and 1.39.x before 1.39.1. E-Widgets does widget replacementin HTML attributes, which can lead to XSS, because widget authors often donot expect that their widget is executed in an HTML attribute context.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
